A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I'm now too old to really be the target market for the saga\, but even so I loved it. Sure there are problems with it if you really look closely\, but that's not what it's all about. It's about how the movie makes you feel\, and I felt 8 years old all over again. \nThis is Star Wars for our kids\, not for the kids of 40 years ago.
